alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 10:27PM EST until February 03 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for a portion of the following river in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette downstream to Riverton. .Lowland flooding continues along much of the Wabash River, from Lafayette down to Riverton. There is potential for flooding to develop later in the week at Vincennes. The crest is currently at Lafayette and rising at all locations south of Lafayette. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY, FEBRUARY 03... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Montezuma. * WHEN...Until Saturday, February 03. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Park in southern Montezuma begins to flood. Higher bottomlands begin to flood. Water backs up most local tributaries. River water is at the top of some private levees. Lowest county roads begin to flood. Parke CR 75 W begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 PM EST Saturday was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.2 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, February 03. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Sunday afternoon by around 130 PM EST /1230 PM CST/.
